name: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Since 1993, Netcracker Technology has been developing and implementing unique IT solutions for more than 250 customers worldwide, mostly telecom providers. We create dozens of innovative products and lead the global market of BSS/OSS solutions ready to be used in the cloud environment. Our comprehensive portfolio of software solutions and professional services enables large-scale digital transformations, unlocking the cloud's opportunities, virtualization, and the changing mobile ecosystem.

We are currently looking for a Monitoring/OLAP/BI systems Senior Software Engineer

Why join our team:

  • Work on design, development, and customization of mission-critical solutions to world-leading telecom companies
  • Implement and support innovative technologies such as 5G, eSIM, Internet access by satellites in low Earth orbit, IoT, etc.
  • Get unlimited opportunities for professional and career development in a global company

What you’ll do

  • Participate in both framework and domain-specific solution implementation;
  • Design and implement modules of system;
  • Perform deep application performance tuning;
  • Participate in researches and prototypes aimed to select appropriate technological components;
  • Participate into system delivery to customer.

What we are looking for:

  • Minimum of 3 years’ experience in Java & PostgreSQL;
  • Experience in monitoring system development or/and delivery (Zabbix, Nagios, Zenoss, HP Openview etc);
  • Experience in OLAP/BI system principles (Oracle, Vertica);
  • Understanding of scalable high load systems design principles;
  • Experience in application performance design and implementation;
  • Database performance optimization experience;
  • Good technical English verbal/writing skills;
  • Management skills- acting as team lead for team of 2-4 developers.

Desired:

  • Knowledge of NoSQL storages principles and key advantages and disadvantages;
  • Experience in BigData;
  • Experience in monitoring (application monitoring, network monitoring etc.) or BI (Business Intelligence) solutions analysis and delivery to customers. Examples of 1-2 projects where BI solution was delivered to production and used in business are expected.

We offer:

  • Competitive salary
  • Medical insurance, covering dental services and online consultations with doctors
  • More than 300 hard and soft-skills programs by the corporate career development center
  • Open environment and encouraging knowledge sharing culture
  • Free English courses and opportunity to practice foreign languages daily
  • Flexible working hours and an opportunity to work remotely
